control_attributes.control_description: The information system enforces configurable network communications traffic volume thresholds reflecting limits on auditing capacity and [Selection: rejects; delays] network traffic above those thresholds.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system writes audit trails to hardware-enforced, write-once media.

Control Statement: The information system enforces configurable network communications traffic volume thresholds reflecting limits on auditing capacity and [Selection: rejects; delays] network traffic above those thresholds.
